name: VR-Swords Physics Update Demo
description:
*Updated with new Physics System*

This package contains 2 Example games, "Sausage Samurai" and "Tatami Attack!", and also a "Show Room" to give you a feel for what my VR-Swords System is capable of. The system is available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace, and contains all the assets and files for the example games, 10 customizable VR-Swords, 2 Custom Swords to create your own swords with any mesh, and a slice-object, that allows you to add virtually any mesh and use it as a procedural mesh that can be sliced.

*Link to Marketplace page*
